titles.title: A resolution providing for a motion to take the bill (H.R. 4416) to extend the authorization of appropriations for titles V and VI of the Library Services and Construction Act through fiscal year 1989, from the Speaker's table together with the Senate amendment and to concur in the Senate amendment.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-1082.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 250 - 118 (Record Vote No: 448).

bill.summary: 10/12/1988--Introduced. Makes it in order to take from the Speaker's table H.R. 4416 (library funding), with the Senate amendment thereto, and to concur in the Senate amendment.
